Global reactions are closely awaited.

TN 2026: The most unpredictable election in years, what’s really happening?
description:
Tamil Nadu heads into the 2026 Assembly election with more uncertainty than ever before. Alliances are shifting, new forces are rising, and old equations no longer add up.
In this episode of The Hindu Focus Tamil Nadu, D. Suresh Kumar breaks down the mood, the moves, and the silent churn shaping the State’s political landscape without giving away the final picture.
From the DMK’s push for a second term to the AIADMK–BJP recalibration, and Vijay’s disruptive entry into the electoral battlefield, this is a snapshot of a state in transition.
A quick, sharp overview of the signals you should be watching as Tamil Nadu moves closer to a decisive moment.

Presentation: D Suresh Kumar 
Video and Editing: Shivaraj S

Additionally, the country is offering 50 new exploration and production blocks to enhance domestic energy output.

description: Police in Himachal Pradesh have registered an FIR after the death of a 19-year-old student of a government college in Dharamshala. Three students were booked for alleged ragging, while a professor faces sexual harassment charges. The case follows a complaint by the victim’s father and the emergence of a video accusing the professor of misconduct. The State government has ordered a probe and suspension of the accused professor.

The system will track battery performance and environmental impact, facilitating second-life usage and efficient recycling processes.

Two-child norm scrapped: Telangana minister cites low fertility rate; panchayat poll rules reset
description: Telangana has scrapped its two-child norm for local body elections, a rule that previously disqualified individuals with more than two children. Citing a declining fertility rate below the replacement level, the state government argued the decades-old population control measure is no longer relevant. Officials believe maintaining the replacement fertility rate is crucial for the state's future demographic balance, as citizens increasingly opt for smaller families.

title: Who is Nicolas Maduro? Venezuelan president ‘captured’ after US strikes
description: The United States has captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro and his wife. President Donald Trump announced the capture following a large-scale strike on Venezuela. The US formally charged Maduro in 2020 and designated his government a foreign terrorist organization in 2025.

title: Why Indian professionals are earning the most in Germany’s job market
description: Indian professionals working full-time in Germany earn the highest median salaries among all nationalities, not due to origin but occupation, a study by the German Economic Institute shows. Concentrated in high-paying STEM and research roles, Indians fill critical skill gaps in Germany’s ageing economy, underscoring how specialised expertise—not nationality—drives wages and innovation.

No Mustafizur for KKR! IPL side confirms release of Bangladesh pacer

The decision came amid political and public controversy after his signing at the auction. KKR will be allowed to name a replacement player. Despite the turmoil off the pitch, Mustafizur continues to perform well in the Bangladesh Premier League.

title: Another Hindu dies in Bangladesh: Khokon Das succumbs to injuries 3 days after being set on fire

The breakthrough intensifies industry debates on scaling AI, with expectations high for DeepSeek's next model release.
